name: Blocks Tower (SussyGames)
description:
Build tower with blocks in this peaceful simple game. Break your own score and have fun! Fetures:
  • calm soundtrack,
  • every game is different,
  • many different shapes,
  • free!
Controls:
  • W and A or arrows to move the block.
  • Spacebar to release the block.
  • R to restart game.
